game.name: Train Simulator: South Devon Main Line: Highbridge and Burnham - Plymouth Route Add-On
game.categories: Single-player, Downloadable Content, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Workshop, In-App Purchases, Steam Cloud, Steam Leaderboards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Explore the iconic Devonian countryside, from rolling hills to famous sea walls, with Just Trains’ sprawling South Devon Main Line for Train Simulator.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Explore the iconic Devonian countryside, from rolling hills to famous sea walls, with Just Trains’ sprawling South Devon Main Line for Train Simulator.
